system.effect: Stores 20 "Storm" Drop Pods, can launch 10 per 30 minutes (1 strategic turn) to a planet. Pods need to be recovered to be reused. +50 Points towards Military Endeavours. Drop Pod holds 10 (req. power armour or drop cocoons to not die from impact).
